original_text: Since Lydda was near Joppa, the disciples, hearing that Peter was there, sent two men to him, urging him, “Please come to us without delay.”
korean_text: 룻다가 욥바에서 가까운지라 제자들이 베드로가 거기 있음을 듣고 두 사람을 보내어 지체 말고 와 달라고 간청하여

sentences.original_text: the disciples heard that Peter was there.
sentences.korean_translation: 제자들은 베드로가 거기에 있다는 것을 듣고,

sentences.original_text: They sent two men to him,
